overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a robust presence across multiple social media platforms with a total of 3,580 followers. Engagement varies by platform, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction levels, particularly in terms of likes and comments. Content often focuses on academic and professional topics related to disinformation, computational methods, and research opportunities.
